plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message
plurals.item: You have %1$d more attempts remaining to enter SIM%2$d PIN.
"You have %1$d more attempt remaining to enter SIM%2$d PIN. If it still fails, you'll have to contact your carrier to unlock the device."

plurals.name: kg_password_default_puk_message
plurals.item: SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempts before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact carrier for details.
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. You have %d remaining attempt before SIM becomes permanently unusable. Contact carrier for details.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM%1$d PIN code, you have %2$d remaining attempts.
Incorrect SIM%1$d PIN code, you have %2$d remaining attempts before you must contact your carrier to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: SIM PUK code is incorrect. You have %d remaining attempt. SIM will be disabled permanently if it fails again.
SIM PUK code is incorrect. You have %d remaining attempts. SIM will be disabled permanently if it fails again.

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_password
plurals.item: Device has stayed locked for %d hr. Please confirm password.
Device has stayed locked for %d hr. Please confirm password.

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_pattern
plurals.item: Device has stayed locked for %d hr. Please confirm pattern.

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_pin
plurals.item: Device has stayed locked for %d hr. Please confirm PIN.
Device has stayed locked for %d hr. Please confirm PIN.
